subject: Horse Racing
Belmont Stakes
lead_paragraph: Madefromlucky is headed for the Belmont Stakes after rallying to beat Conquest Curlinate by a length in the $196,000 Peter Pan Stakes for 3-year-olds.
snippet: Madefromlucky is headed for the Belmont Stakes after rallying to beat Conquest Curlinate by a length in the $196,000 Peter Pan Stakes for 3-year-olds.
